controller

Class ReplayBoardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ReplayBoardController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class ReplayBoardController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is the controller for the replay of the game, it provides methods for read the log and update the UI
    Author:
    Nicola Gemo
